subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Raymond Felton and Amar’e Stoudemire rank among the league’s top 16 in minutes per game, but Coach Mike D’Antoni hopes to rest them a bit.
snippet: Raymond Felton and Amar’e Stoudemire rank among the league’s top 16 in minutes per game, but Coach Mike D’Antoni hopes to rest them a bit.
